section.name: About itracker
section.p: itracker is a true open source issue tracking system licensed under the LGPL license.
itracker is built using Java enterprise technology.
itracker is a professional, easy to use, open, integrateable, fast, modular, customizable and scalable solution for all kind of projects.

Currently there is a bunch of people rewriting itracker towards a new Release 3.0, but it seems to take time. The refactoring is based on Spring 2.0, Hibernate 3 and Struts 1.X.
The Release 3.0 is not yet finished, and if you or your company can give us a hand you are more than welcome to contribute! If you are able to help (by programming, documenting or testing...), then please feel free to join.
THERE ARE STILL SOME (MINOR) BUGS TO GO (COME ON GUYS - OPEN SOURCE MEANS EVERYONE WORKS ;->)
- please help.
Please also help us to write further unit tests and remove scriptlets from the JSP's.
If you need an issue management system now, you can go and get itracker 2.4.2 on SourceForge. It's a reliable solution, and you'll be able to upgrade to the coming Release 3.0.
You can also now start to testdrive our Release 3.0 from the trunk. It's quite stable.
